name: Protective Subroutine
summary: Your nanites can augment your defenses.
description:
Your nanites can augment your defenses. You can choose to activate Nanite Surge when you attempt a saving throw, instead of when you attempt a skill check. If you do, you gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.Traits

Android: A synthetic humanoid ancestry created by artificial means. Most common in Numeria.
